channel.title: George Albercook on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in George Albercook on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Chasing the elusive weather balloon
item.description: Thursday's adventure was George Albercook's launch and successful retrieval of a weather balloon, with a payload of radios, cameras, and GPS telemetry. Here's a map of the telemetry that was visible through APRS.FI for the duration of the launch. The device is identified as KC8SBA. Note that for some reason tracking didn't pick up until a few minutes after the launch, and the tracking was also silent for a while until just before the descent.
